data.title: Chart Type
data.desc: You can choose from various types of charts to visualize your data effectively.

insights.desc: ピボットテーブルの作り方をご紹介します。

insights.title: テーブルの作り方
insights.desc: テーブルの作り方をご紹介します。

insights.title: Introduction to Bar Chart
insights.desc: You can quickly create various types of bar charts in a simple way!

insights.title: Introduction to Line Chart
insights.desc: Line charts are great especially for visualizing time series data. Here's how you can quickly create them with various options!

insights.desc: エリアチャートの作り方をご紹介します。

insights.desc: ヒストグラムの作り方をご紹介します。

insights.title: 密度曲線の作り方
insights.desc: 密度曲線の作り方をご紹介します。

insights.title: 散布図（集計なし）の作り方
insights.desc: 散布図（集計なし）の作り方をご紹介します。

insights.title: 散布図（集計あり）の作り方
insights.desc: 散布図（集計あり）の作り方をご紹介します。

insights.title: Introduction to Boxplot Chart
insights.desc: Boxplot chart is very helpful when it comes to understanding the distribution of your data or even better, compare how the distribution differs among various groups.

insights.title: バイオリン図の作り方
insights.desc: バイオリン図の作り方をご紹介します。

insights.title: How to Use Error Bar
insights.desc: You can use Error Bar chart to show confidence intervals for Mean (Average) values and for Ratio values.

insights.title: ヒートマップの作り方
insights.desc: ヒートマップの作り方をご紹介します。

insights.title: Radar Chart
insights.desc: Here's how you can use Radar Chart.

insights.title: 地図 - 標準の使い方
insights.desc: 地図 - 標準の使い方についてご紹介します。

insights.title: 地図 - 経度/緯度の作り方
insights.desc: 地図 - 経度/緯度の作り方をご紹介します。

insights.title: Map - Extension with GeoJSON
insights.desc: You can extend Map with your GeoJSON files.

insights.title: ナンバーの作り方
insights.desc: ナンバーの作り方をご紹介します。

insights.title: ワードクラウドの作り方
insights.desc: ワードクラウドの作り方をご紹介します。

insights.title: 集合バーチャートの作り方
insights.desc: 集合バーチャートの作り方をご紹介します。

data.title: Chart Features
data.desc: There are various Chart features you can use to enrich your data visualization.

insights.title: Pin - Set a Particular Data Step to Visualize
insights.desc: The most important feature of Chart is 'Pin'. You can pin the chart to a particular step so that it will always source the chart data from the pinned step even when new Data Wrangling steps are added.

insights.title: Window Calculation - Percentage of Total
insights.desc: You can learn how you can use Window Calculation feature to visualize '% of Total' with Bar chart in this Note.

insights.title: Window Calculation - Cummulative Sum
insights.desc: You can learn how to create a chart to show cumulative sum (running total).

insights.title: Window Calculation - Moving Average
insights.desc: Here's how to create a chart to show moving average.

insights.title: Window Calculation - Period Ago (e.g. Same Month in Last Year)
insights.desc: Here's how to create a chart to show the growth compared to the same month in the last year or quarter.

insights.title: Window Calculation - % Difference from First Value
insights.desc: Here's how you can create a chart to show the % of Difference from First Value with 'Window Calculation' feature.

insights.title: Show Reference Line
insights.desc: Here's how you can draw reference lines on chart.

insights.title: Show Trend Line
insights.desc: Here's how you can draw various types of trendlines on chart.

insights.title: Color Configuration
insights.desc: You can flexibly assign colors to particular groups in charts, here's how.

insights.title: Highlight Particular Groups
insights.desc: You can highlight particular values with specified colors.

insights.title: Set Colors with a Condition
insights.desc: You can create a condition to set colors. Here's how.

insights.title: Categorizing Numerical Values (Create Bins)
insights.desc: Here's how you can categorize numerical values by dividing into multiple groups.

insights.title: Custom Color Palette
insights.desc: You can create your own color palette, here's how.

insights.title: Comment / Annotation
insights.desc: You can add comments to your charts, here's how.

insights.title: Categorize Numeric Values with Equal Step
insights.desc: You can convert numeric values such as Age, Income, Sales, etc. into a set of groups with an 'Equal Step' option, which will create a group for an every given number such as 'every 10'.

insights.title: Show Multiple Measures in Multiple Charts
insights.desc: You can separate a chart to multiple charts and show each measure in its own chart with Repeat By.

insights.title: Show Only Top (Bottom) 10 Values
insights.desc: You can limit the values to be shown for X-Axis/Color.

insights.title: Switch Marker between Bar, Line, and Circle.
insights.desc: You can switch the marker to be bar, line, or circle.

insights.title: Reverse the Order for X/Y-Axis
insights.desc: You can change the order of X-Axis and/or Y-Axis.

insights.title: 集計テーブル: クイック・ビジュアルフォーマット
insights.desc: 集計テーブルにあるクイック・ビジュアルフォーマットの使い方をご紹介します。

insights.title: Missing Value (NA) Handlnig in Chart
insights.desc: There are various ways to handle or fill the missing values (NA) inside the chart.

insights.title: How to Summarize with Conditions (SUM_IF)
insights.desc: You can summarize data conditionally, which means you can create your own conditions for the data to be summarized.

insights.title: 集計テーブルの合計の計算対象を集計前に変更する方法
insights.desc: 集計テーブルの合計の計算対象を集計前に変更する方法をご紹介します。

insights.title: Use Dual Axes to Show Multiple Measures
insights.desc: You can assign the columns to either Y1 or Y2 axis.

insights.title: Show Bar and Line in a Single Chart
insights.desc: You can use different markers for different measures in the same chart.

insights.title: Add Your Own GeoJSON for Map
insights.desc: You can learn on how you can install your GeoJSON files and start visualizing data with your own Map.

insights.title: チャート上に値を表示する方法
insights.desc: チャート上に値を表示する方法をご紹介します。

data.title: Data Visualization Workshop
data.desc: You can learn how to choose the right charts based on the type of data, how to visualize various types of data effectively, how to prepare data to visualize, etc. and share the tutorials and data with you so that you can practice by yourself.

insights.title: #1 - Visualizing Summarized Data
insights.desc: In this seminar, you can learn how you can choose the right chart types and demonstrate how to visualize summarized (aggregated) data effectively.

insights.title: #2 - Visualizing Time Series Data
insights.desc: In this seminar, you can learn how you can visualize Time Series data effectively with Exploratory.

insights.title: #3 - Visualizing Variance & Correlation
insights.desc: In this seminar, you can learn how to visualize variance in data and correlation between variables with various chart types in Exploratory.

insights.title: #4 - Visualizing Uncertainty with Confidence Interval
insights.desc: In this seminar, we introduce concepts like 'Uncertainty' and 'Confidence Interval' and show you how you can visualize them effectively with Error Bar in Exploratory.

insights.title: データの可視化ワークショップ #5 - 可視化のためのデータラングリング
insights.desc: データを可視化する時によく直面するデータの加工に関する問題を効率的に解決していく方法を紹介します。
